questions.question: This term refers to extremely large data sets that may be analyzed computationally to reveal patterns, trends, and associations.
This open-source framework is used for distributed storage and processing of large data sets using the MapReduce programming model.
This term refers to the process of examining large data sets to uncover hidden patterns, unknown correlations, and other useful information.
This distributed computing system is designed for processing large-scale data across many computers.
This term refers to the practice of collecting and analyzing data from various sources to gain insights and make informed decisions.
